name: Cart Menu
help: For more information about this component and how it works, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#cart-menu).

icon.name: Show icon
icon.help: Allows to display an icon next to the menu title.

actions.name: Buttons priority
actions.help: Allows to define which of the buttons of the menu will be the one with higher priority to customers.

actions_text.name: Actions text
actions_text.help: Text that displays before the buttons to inform customers that Shipping & Taxes will be finally calculated at the Checkout. If not needed, just leave this field empty.
actions_text.default: Shipping costs will be calculated at Checkout.
